desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This field contains the stage the SAFEKEEP.HOLDING record has
reached. It will either be 'CALCULATED' if the Safecustody fees
have been calculated but not posted or 'POSTED' once the fees
have been debited from the portfolio (or suspense) account.
No input field automatically updated by the system.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This field contains the difference between the previously posted charges
and the new charges that have been recalculated.
Noinput field.
This field contains the customer number for which fees are being posted.
Its a noinput field.
Identifies the Discount Amount to be applied to the
the calculated Safekeeping Charge.
Automatically calculated by the system.
Optional Input.
Identifies the Average Closing Balance to be used in calculating the Safekeeping Charge.
Noinput field.
Value Date of Safecustody Fees posting. Defaulted from SAFECUSTODY
VALUES value date if process type field is set to 'periodic'
otherwise uses today's date. Can be amended by the user.
Standard T24 date field.
Identifies the Securities Holding Depository
Charge, in Local Currency
Optional Input.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Identifies the Start of the Charge Period for Safekeeping Charges.
Noinput field.
Reason for modification to Safecustody fees.
Multi-valued field.
Optional input.
Identifies the Exchange Rate between the Tax Amount
and the Local Currency.
Noinput field.
Contains all the Override messages which the user agreed to during Input.
In the event that the user confirms the Override, the full text of the actual Override Message will be stored, for reference purposes only, in this multivalue field.
Identifies the End Period of the Safekeeping Charge.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Charge Code or Group to be used for
Safekeeping Charge.
Defaulted from SCSK.GROUP.CONDITION - Tax.Comm.Code
Noinput field.
This field contains the charges that were calculated prior to backvalue transaction that
resulted in recalculation of safekeeping fees in the account currency.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Tax applied to the Safekeeping Charge.
Noinput field.
Identifies the system calculated Safekeeping Charge
in Local Currency, for this portfolio.
Noinput field.
Y/N flag showing if the safecustody fees are ready for posting.
Identfies the Tax Code used in the calculation of
the Tax Amount.
Tax Code is extracted from above Charge Code.
Noinput Field.
This field contains the charges that were present before the backvalue transaction that
resulted in the recalculation of fees in local currency .
Noinput field.
This field contains the difference between the previously calculated charges and the
new calculate safekeeping charges in the account currency.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Tax applied to the Safekeeping Charge
in Local Currency.
Noinput field.
Identifies the resultant Customer Safekeeping Charge.
Noinput field.
This field contains only two values YES/NO which specifies whether the record was system generated or modified by a backvalue recalculation.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Safekeeping Charge in Local Currency
Will be automatically calculated by the system. Any modification
to this amount will update the SC.FEES.MODIFY file.
Any input must be numeric and cannot be less than zero.
Indentifies the Period of the Safekeeping Charge in Months.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Currency of the Account to be used to
post Safekeeping Charges.
Noinput field.
Identfies the Customer Account to be used to
post Safekeeping Charges.
Defaulted from the Sec.Acc.Master - Safekeep.Chrg.Acc
Mandatory Input

System-maintained field populated only when SAFECUSTODY.VALUES>PERFORM.ACCRUAL is set to DAILY. Recorded to support the reversal of accounting entries following fee reversal after the fee-realisation date.
Identifies the Exchange Rate between :
Account Currency and Local Currency.
Noinput field.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
